text: Arundhati Reddy is an Indian cricket player. She was born on 4 October 1997. In August 2018, she joined in the Indian Women's team for a series against Sri Lanka. On 19 September 2018, she played her first T20 International cricket (WT20I) against Sri Lanka. In October 2018, she joined the Indian team for the 2018 ICC Women's World T20 tournament in the West Indies. In January 2020, she was selected in Indian team for the 2020 ICC Women's T20 World Cup in Australia. In May 2021, she was a member of Indian women's cricket team for a single match against the England women's cricket team. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1997 births Category:Indian cricketers Category:Living people
title: Arundhati Reddy
